stylePresets.name: Dark Cinematic
stylePresets.description: A dark, cinematic waltz perfect for tense, elegant scenes
stylePresets.stylePrompt: A dark, cinematic waltz in 3/4 time, C# minor, 80 BPM. A blend of baroque chamber music and modern psychological thriller scoring. Elegant, tense, and unsettling. Lead melody with harpsichord and solo cello trading melancholic, ornate phrases. Small string section with sustained, dissonant chords creating wrongness. Deep plucked contrabass on waltz beat with subtle low sub-bass drone. Glass harmonica adds high, shimmering, eerie texture. Constantly holding breath with long pauses between phrases. Dynamics shift from pianissimo to mezzo-forte abruptly. Unresolved final chord.
stylePresets.negativePrompt: cheerful, bright, major key, fast tempo, percussion, drums

stylePresets.name: The Strategist's Gambit
stylePresets.description: Cold, methodical electronic music for calculating, strategic moments
stylePresets.stylePrompt: Minimalist dark electronic music, cinematic tension, E minor, 110 BPM. Rhythmic, methodical, and building to a silent, terrifying conclusion. A score for a political purge. Cold logic of ruthless planning clicking into place. Sparse, calculated beats with subtle synth layers building tension.
